familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of THC Dubai II Hotel Manager LLC. According to Trump's 2016 financial disclosure, the company, which he alone owned, was dormant or inactive. Its current activity status and ownership structure were not articulated in his 2017 financial disclosure.
